text: Yes! I had assumptions made about me as a developer when I wore sundresses. Now as an advocate I wear branded t-shirts and jeans. The bright blazers worked well @DevoxxUK and gave me confidence so keeping them. Let's avoid commenting on speaker attire and focus on what they say. https://t.co/LaiyZSvyCE

author.name: Carly Richmond
